column4: hey,,, I can't upgrade from lucid to maverick :( I'm not very good at ubuntu and I have not much computer skill. please help me fix this :(
it says I have maverick but it still has the lucid software...
none of the new maverick stuff
sudo do-release-upgrade says no new update found
apt-get update && apt-get upgrade <-- first thing to do, but before check your repositories
close all other apt, dpkg. soft center, or synaptic
theres nothing else open except for firefox terminal and xchat
you can remove lock manually or reboot (syslog have info of any broken installation)
it is graphic driver, i recommend to: sudo killall dpkg and run Additional Hardware from menu
it is not, just sometimes troublesome...
with the very same manager - Additional Hardware - there is option to remove driver
no there isn't... thers no drivers listed under additional drivers
